project.projectName: Badgario - A ðŸ’© version of Agar.io
project.projectDescription: This project is the closest I have come to making a finished, playable game. I made it as a side project during my first work term (Fall 2017) as a way to learn the basics of game development. It plays exactly like Agar.io, the difference being that it is single player, and in order to win, you have to defeat a final boss.

project.projectName: Vector Playground - Visualize vectors in 3d space!
project.projectDescription: My grade 12 computer science final project. I, along with 3 other classmates (We called ourselves MagV Studios, haha), created an application using the Unity 3d Game Engine to visualize vectors in a 3 dimensional environment. We needed to cater our app to a specific client and his needs, which in this case, was our grade 12 Calculus teacher, Mr. Hyde.
Do you use Telegram and live in China and absolutely hate the Great Firewall? Well, why not send a message through our proxy-bot!
Have real-time non-intrusive feedback directly from the audience! Won 2nd place at McHacks 2017 in McGill University.

project.projectName: Haoda Fan Dot Com HD Remastered
project.projectDescription: Wish to know a bit more about me? Want to laugh at my self-deprecating jokes and see my amazing web development skills in action? Well come visit my website, which also happens to be this website. Whoa, this is kind of meta.
